a-button/ghost.description: make background transparent and invert text and border colors, added in 2.7

a-button/htmlType.description: set the original html type of button, see: MDN

a-button/icon.description: set the icon of button, see: Icon component

a-button/loading.description: set the loading status of button

a-button/shape.description: can be set to circle or omitted

a-button/size.description: can be set to small large or omitted

a-button/type.description: can be set to primary ghost dashed danger(added in 2.7) or omitted (meaning default)

a-button/block.description: option to fit button width to its parent width
